entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as saying it's not so much a bedroom, more a kind of den. He sleeps under the boiler in that cupboard off the kitchen.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as describing the room as a den and saying they should knock before entering Kreacher's bedroom.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as strolling over to a dingy door in the corner opposite the pantry which Harry had never seen open.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher's bedroom is mentioned and Ron raps on the door but there is no reply.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as being in the basement when they arrived.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as peering inside Kreacher's bedroom and seeing a very large and old-fashioned boiler.

relationships.description: Ron enters Kreacher's bedroom without knocking.
Harry sees the very large and old-fashioned boiler in Kreacher's bedroom.
